pr_title: OpenShift manifests now reference the correct artifact

timeline.bodyText:
That won't work. You can configure the name and the suffix in PackageConfig.
See https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/master/core/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/deployment/pkg/steps/JarResultBuildStep.java#L179 for instance.
